Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the photo was taken during the 2019 Hong Kong protests when it was actually taken in 2014.
Understate: The claim may understate the extent of violence and anti-social acts committed by the pro-democracy protesters during the protests.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the duty of the police is solely to maintain social stability and strictly enforce the law, without considering other aspects of their role.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support or evidence to substantiate the statement that police officers were "most endangered, fatigued, and aggrieved" during the protests.
Exist alternative explanation: There could be alternative explanations for the photo, such as the police officers resting due to fatigue or other reasons unrelated to the protests.
